dataTemplate.name: XXPAGSPE
dataTemplate.description: OD GSO PO Import Exceptions Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT distinct vendor_no, vendor_name, sku, description FROM xx_gso_po_stg WHERE load_batch_id=:p_batch_id AND sku_process_flag=3 ORDER BY vendor_no,sku
SELECT distinct vendor_no, vendor_name, sku, description FROM xx_gso_po_stg WHERE load_batch_id=:p_batch_id AND eol_Flag='Y' ORDER BY vendor_no,sku
